name: Chun Cao
content: Chun@ICS Search Chun Cao Associate Professor State Key Laboratory for Novel Software Technology Department of Computer Science and Technology Nanjing University Biography Chun Cao is an associate professor in computer science at the Nanjing University. He received a B.S. and his Ph.D. degree in computer science from Nanjing University in 2000 and 2007 respectively. He’s currently focus on the research on distributed computing platform technology. Interests Distributed computing platform（for cloud computing, big data and deep learning） Dynamic software update Android testing Education Ph.D., 2007 Department of Computer Science and Technology, Nanjing University B.S., 2000 Department of Computer Science and Technology, Nanjing University Publications Quickly discover relevant content by [filtering publications](/en/publication/).
